channel.title: Switching off doubled double quotes?
channel.description:
In Drafts on iOS when I type a single " character (double quotes) I get two double quotes with the cursor between them. This is _somewhat_ convinient, but most of the time it throws me off and means that due to corrections I have to do rather more then less typing/editing work...
Is there any way to switch this off? (It must be an app-specific setting, because other apps to not do this.)

item.title: Switching off doubled double quotes?
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Look in editor settings at the settings for your syntax. Ensure that you disable auto-match.
